WorkItem.ClosedComment: Can't repro this since changes have been made to how OxiteApplication reloads data, so closing.
WorkItem.Description:
When changing settings, OxiteApplication.ReloadSite() is called, which i.a. re-registers the routes. However, it will throw this exception: 
"A route named 'RemoveComment' is already in the route collection. Route names must be unique. Parameter name: name"
